  • About my work

2016 — Pirapendurando I - Rio das Artes

In one of our meetings under the bridge, a representative of the Rio Das Águas event, sponsored by Sesc and Piracicaba City Hall, invited us to participate of the event. The event brings together several artists to hold exhibitions near the Piracicaba River (right where we always were). From then on, we prepared to deliver a show to the public on May 1, 2016, right there, under the bridge. Now, the group of friends had a name: Pirapendurando. Guilherme Xavier, Emanoela Ribeiro and Felipe Nunes are trained in theater and they conducted us in the rehearsals. We elaborate a show aimed at children, with many colors, almost no speech, with fun interactions between the characters and, of course, many aerial stunts. We installed the aerial silk, lyre and trapeze at the bridge. With everything decorated and prepared, the show "De última hora" (named after the rush in the preparations) took place.
